name: The composite bow, 'Rising Sun' (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
This bow draws its power from the sun, manifesting arrows of pure light as long
as it is allowed to periodically recharge under the rays of the sun. While it
will work in the darkness, it is more powerful if fired in direct sunlight.
